results.title: Comparison of Safety and Efficacy of Glimepiride-Metformin and Vildagliptin- Metformin Treatment in Newly Diagnosed Type 2 Diabetic Patients
results.text_hl: When safety outcomes were considered, there were no @<m>DISEASE_Hypoglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@ events observed with @CHEMICAL_Vildagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077597 @@@vildagliptin@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, whereas mild @<m>DISEASE_Hypoglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@ was reported with @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@glimepiride@@@ added to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System
results.text_hl: We believe that this @DISEASE_Hypovolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D020896 @@@hypovolemia@@@ might cause @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ and compensatory @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ exposure can also reduce @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ absorption, lower hepatic @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ synthesis, and induce @<m>DISEASE_Hypoglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@.

results.text_hl: The ranking results showed that the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group had the lowest rates of @<m>DISEASE_Hypoglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@neonatal hypoglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@LGA@@@, and NICU occupancy.
